interval.description: The interval at which the power's action(s) trigger.
interval.markdownDescription: The interval at which the power's action(s) trigger.

bientity_action.description: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target each interval.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target each interval.

rising_action.description: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes true.
rising_action.markdownDescription: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes true.

falling_action.description: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes false.
falling_action.markdownDescription: A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes false.

bientity_condition.description: A bi-entity condition that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target for this power to be run.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: A bi-entity condition that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target for this power to be run.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Projectile Action Over Time (Power Type) date: 2023-02-04

Projectile Action Over Time

Power Type

Execute actions upon landing a projectile on a target.

Type ID: apugli:projectile_action_over_time

Fields

Field Type Default Description
interval Integer 20 The interval at which the power's action(s) trigger.
bientity_action Bi-entity Action optional A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target each interval.
rising_action Bi-entity Action optional A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes true.
falling_action Bi-entity Action optional A bi-entity action that is run with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target as soon as the power's bi-entity condition becomes false.
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition optional A bi-entity condition that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the projectile as the target for this power to be run.

Examples

{
    "type": "apugli:projectile_action_over_time",
    "bientity_action": {
        "type": "origins:add_velocity",
        "z": 0.1
    },
    "bientity_condition": {
        "type": "apoli:target_condition",
        "condition": {
            "type": "apoli:in_tag",
            "tag": "minecraft:arrows"
        }
    }
}

This example will push any arrows that the power holder shot away from them.
